page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: Our house is a council house. It has 12 windows, 2 doors (front and back) I have 3 brothers. We have two televisions. Our favourite t.v. programmes are The A Team, Streat Hawk and Gentle Ben. Our brother sometimes goes fishing down the River Clwyd he has caught quite a few. I go with him sometimes. A typical meal for me and my family would be chips,sausage,peas and bread and butter.I usually drink lemon squash while my parents drink tea. {I go to the local school and I like {playing in the recreation ground.I {mostly play football. } I get up at half past seven and at quarter to eight, I deliver the papers for a few of the villagers.I get 30p a week for this.
